mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER( USER_NUM, USER_ID, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE ) VALUES ( SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone} )
mapper.select: SELECT USER_NUM, PASSWORD, EMAIL, PHONE, NICKNAME, USER_ID, NAME, MANAGER, SECESSION, JOIN_DATE, CORRECTION, STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND PASSWORD = #{password} AND STATUS = 'Y'
